properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT, B.STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
